text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC So far you haven’t actually held a Republican Convention anywhere.  Given the explosion of Covid-19 in Florida I wonder if they aren’t having second thoughts.  Are the hospitals in Jacksonville going to overcrowded!  Are the ICU’s going to be able to take anymore patients.
